author: Unreal Engine
description:
Wouldn't it be great to have a button you could click to convert a Blueprint to C++, one that updates your entire project instantly, and leaves it in a fully compiled and runnable state?

Everyone knows that converting Blueprints manually is tedious and highly error-prone, often to the point where you can’t justify the effort and simply live with the problem. However, after a while it can’t be avoided any longer due to performance issues or overly complex Blueprints that are hard to maintain. And typically this comes very late in development—the worst possible time.  Ironically, when conversion begins, everyone focuses on the C++ part of the process, which is the easy part. The hard parts are often ignored or left as-is. 

Those hard parts are what this talk is really about: fixing up every Blueprint node (especially Cast nodes), every variable, Data Table, asset, INI file, and a whole lot more—not to mention all Actor instances across all levels. 

This session shines a light on all
title: Converting Blueprints the Right Way | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Step into the future of filmmaking workflows with Unreal Engine 5, the ultimate tool for virtual scouting, digital twins, previsualization, and cinematics. This presentation explores how real-time technology empowers filmmakers to visualize complex scenes, experiment with lighting, camera angles, and lensing, and refine their creative vision—all before stepping onto a physical set. 

Learn about practical workflows and interoperability between departments like production design, art department, lighting, and camera while involving HOD's into the Epic Games suite of tools like Twinmotion, FAB, Reality Capture and UE5. Sharing how to capture, calibrate and profile camera, lenses, lights and locations as digital twins to build show libraries to use in Twinmotion and UE5 for films, cinematics, games, and virtual production.

#SpaceboyLabs, #VirtualProduction, #VirtualScouting, #DigitalTwins, #Previsualization, #Cinematics, #Filmmaking, #Twinmotion, #Fab, #RealityScan, #UnrealEngine, #UE5,
title: Crafting the Look: Virtual Cinematography in UE5 | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
You're not going to want to be late (fashionably or otherwise) to Zoe Anna Vanezis' talk at Unreal Fest Stockholm: First Steps for Fashion Designers 👗

Using her own background in fashion, she's been helping teach students how Unreal Engine can be used in fashion design. Now it's your turn to learn all about it at Stockholmsmässan in September: http://epic.gm/unreal-fest-stockholm-agenda
title: Unreal Fest Stockholm Meet the Presenter: Zoe
